info.name: HailJoe's Revisited Spells
info.description: HailJoe's Revisited, Already Existing Spells with Changes.

element.name: Ray of Sickness Revisited
element.supports: Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Spell Attack

description.p: A ray of sickening greenish energy lashes out toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is also become poisoned.
The target becomes poisoned, until successing the saving throw. The target repeats its saving throw at the end of its turn.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.
